document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Thorp Villa on Vhezoar Street.
document_data.name: Thorp Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Thorp Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Thorp (family)|Thorp]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the eastern side of [[Vhezoar Street]] just south of [[Hassantyr's Street]]. The estate also sat in between [[Stabbed Sailor Alley]], [[Sprangalar's Swordcut]], and the [[Street of the Manticore]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Four separate buildings within the walled compound were arranged around a central courtyard. All three buildings were three stories tall.
